Core estimates the maximum gas (maxFeePe: Core estimates the maximum gas (maxFeePerGas) a transaction could consume based on network conditions. This transaction will likely consume less gas than estimated.
Core functionality may be unstable with: Core functionality may be unstable with custom RPC URLs.
Core is committed to protecting your pri: Core is committed to protecting your privacy. We will never sell or share your data. If you wish, you can disable this at any time in the settings menu.
Core supports Bitcoin via Fireblocks wit: Core supports Bitcoin via Fireblocks with a few extra steps. If you choose to skip, you will not be able to bridge or use the Bitcoin Network.
Core will <b>never</b> sell or share dat: Core will never sell or share data.
